title: Vigilante but it's a discord mod

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Shoot a player at night. 3 uses.
- Target a player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not shoot night 1.
- Anyone you visit, regardless of the ability you use, will be banned.
- You will ban your target first, **then** shoot them, but they won't be a valid target unless they somehow don't get banned.
- If you somehow manage to shoot a townie, you will not be allowed to *shoot* the next night and you will commit suicide.
- If you fail to ban your target, kick them from the server.
- If you fail to kick your target, remove them from the game directly.
